## Is GitLab Down

> Check if GitLab is down

## Inspired From

- [Sindresorhus's is-github-down](https://github.com/sindresorhus/is-github-down)

## Install

```
$ pip install isgitlabdown
```

## Usage

```
$ isgitlabdown

 ðŸ˜ž It's down.

$ isgitlabdown

 ðŸ˜Š It's up.
```
